mapper.sql: permission_id, permission_name, permission_url, permission, permission_type, `status`, create_date, modify_date
mapper.select: SELECT p.permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_url, p.permission, p.permission_type FROM tb_user u JOIN tb_role_user ru ON ru.user_id = u.user_id JOIN tb_role r ON r.role_id = ru.role_id JOIN tb_permission_role pr ON pr.role_id = r.role_id JOIN tb_permission p ON p.permission_id = pr.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select tp.permission_id, permission_name, permission_url, permission, permission_type, `status`,create_date, modify_date from tb_permission tp join tb_permission_role tpr on tp.permission_id = tpr.permission_id where tpr.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
